entry.title: Road Snowfall Warning
entry.summary: Another round of snow is expected Saturday night into Sunday morning, and 1 to 3 cm may settle about the summit, with lesser amounts down to 800 metres.

entry.title: Road Snowfall Warning
entry.summary: Another period of snow is expected Saturday evening when 3 to 6 cm can accumulate above 800 metres. Easing to snow showers overnight when another 1 cm could accumulate down to 400 metres.

author.name: Meteorological Service of New Zealand Limited

entry.title: Road Snowfall Warning
entry.summary: Snow is expected on the road again tonight with another 1 to 2 cm expected to accumulate about the highest parts of the road.

author.name: Meteorological Service of New Zealand Limited

entry.title: Road Snowfall Warning
entry.summary: Snow is expected about the road tonight and 1 to 2 cm could accumulate above 800 metres. Easing to snow showers early Sunday morning with up to 1 cm accumulating down to 500 metres.

entry.title: Road Snowfall Warning
entry.summary: Snow is expected again from this evening, with another 10 to 20 cm accumulating about higher parts of the road with less down to 700 metres. Easing to snow showers overnight with another 1 to 2 cm accumulating down to 400 metres Sunday morning.
